Updates Publications Blog

A short list of my scholarly activities…

  • November, 2021 - Inaugural Event of Elmezzi APSA Local Chapter
  • November, 2021 - Poster presentation at SfN'2021 (my first SfN!)
  • October, 2021 - Establishing the Elmezzi APSA Local Chapter
  • April, 2021 - Activated AAN and APSA memberships
  • March, 2021 - Published my work on Periventricular Heteropias in Journal of Neuroscience
  • October, 2020 - Meeting with High School Students
  • October, 2020 - Poster presentation at Advances and Perspectives in Auditory Neuroscience (APAN)
  • June, 2020 - Poster presentation at BRAIN Initiative Investigator's Meeting
  • June, 2019 - Started PhD at Elmezzi Graduate School of Molecular Medicine
  • October, 2018 - Started Post-doc at Stanford University
  • July, 2018 - Graduated from Istanbul University Cerrahpaşa School of Medicine
